content.body: Hey, it looks like only 3 people are invited to the champions meeting event (Jesse, Richard, Eemeli). I assume this is a bug. To fix it, I created a Google Group https://groups.google.com/a/chromium.org/g/tc39-numerics and invited it to the event. Please join the Google Group to be added to the meeting.
I went ahead and added Jesse as a group manager.
